title: UIDAI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Advisor Posts
description: The Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Advisor and Senior Advisor Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS can apply for the UIDAI Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, applic...
